title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. II, pt. 80 - Examination And Copying Of Records
content:

State Regulations
§ 80.1 - Purpose and scope
§ 80.2 - Designation and duties of the records access officer
§ 80.3 - Subject matter list
§ 80.4 - Requests for public access to records
§ 80.5 - Inspection of records
§ 80.6 - Protection of exempt material, trade secrets and critical infrastructure information
§ 80.7 - Procedure to be followed in the event of denial of access to records or denial of exception from disclosure
§ 80.8 - Fees
§ 80.9 - Public notice
§ 80.10 - Intent
§ 80.11 - Repealed
§ 80.12 - Repealed
§ 80.13 - Procedure
§ 80.14 - Agreement

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. II, pt. 80

Statutory authority: Public Officers Law, art. 6, §§ 87, 89; Executive Law, § 91, 96, 156-c[2][a]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
